general.gigTitle: develop a professional website for you

sellerCard.description:
I am a Fiverr TOP RATED PRO Seller working since last 8 years.
I can provide you a 100% Functional mobile app for your business for both Android and iOS as per your requirements.

description.content:
Looking for a professional website for your business? You have found the right place.

I will develop a modern, secure and mobile responsive platform for your business.


About me;

I am working as a Software developer for last 6 years. I have expertise of developing websites using;

PHP 

Angular JS

Wordpress

HTML/CSS

Java Script.


Industries I have worked with;

Job Seeking

E-Commerce

Food & Beverages

Finance

Dating

Video Streaming

Services.


What will be delivered?

1- Source files of the Designs of the site

2- Source code of the frontend and backend platform

3- I will upload the data to your hosting/server and will connect the website with your domain.


Complementary Services:

After the website development is complete, I will upload your website to your server, will connect it with your domain to make it live to the world and will also provide you with FREE post project support for bug fixing for 2 months after the site is live


If you like my gig, please reach me out so that we can discuss the scope of work, timeline and price of project and can get started.


Please note that the prices mentioned in the gig are tentative and may vary as per your requirements.


Thank you

Saad.

slide.name: develop a professional website for you
develop a professional website for you
develop a professional website for you

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you also provide support after the project is finished?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, after the project is live, I will provide you with free post project support for bug fixing for 2 months and after that we can decide a monthly price for support

questionsAndAnswers.question: When should I get a server/hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: In start, I can use my hosting for testing and when the website is completely developed, at that stage, you can give me your hosting details and I can deploy the site to your hosting.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: I will develop a simple one page website for you in this package without payment gateways

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: I will develop a 3 page website for you in this package

packageList.title: Premium
packageList.description: I will develop multi page custom website for you as per your requirements in this package
